name: ByteRover Project Progress
description: Check project progress, resume paused work, and route to the next action intelligently
long_description: A structured workflow for understanding where a project stands and what to do next. Loads all project state from the knowledge base, presents a status report with milestone and phase progress, detects paused work or incomplete phases, and intelligently routes to the appropriate next workflow skill to invoke.

use_cases: Deciding what to work on next
